pre.      Text in a pre block
is displayed in a fixed-width
     font. It preserves
  s p a c e s, line breaks
     and ascii bunnies.
           _     _
           \`\ /`/
            \ V /
            /. .\
           =\ T /=
            / ^ \
         {}/\\ //\
         __\ " " /__
        (____/^\____)
